TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ArgumentDirection extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the direction of data flow for an .

remarks.format:
## Examples In this example, an <xref:System.Activities.InArgument%601> of type <xref:System.String> is created using the <xref:System.Activities.Argument.Create%2A> method of the <xref:System.Activities.Argument> class.
```csharp Argument a = Argument.Create(typeof(string), ArgumentDirection.In); ```

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Activities.ArgumentDirection In = int32(0)

Docs.summary: An that represents the flow of data into a workflow or activity.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Activities.ArgumentDirection InOut = int32(2)

Docs.summary: An that represents the flow of data into and out of a workflow or activity.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Activities.ArgumentDirection Out = int32(1)

Docs.summary: An that represents the flow of data out of a workflow or activity.
